import React, { Component, useState } from "react"; import jwt_decode from "jwt-decode"; import axios from "axios"; import Table from "@material-ui/core/Table"; import { Dropdown, Badge, Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import { ip } from "../services"; import axiosInstance from "../utils/axiosConfig"; import { TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, TableCell, TableBody, Paper, } from "@material-ui/core"; import moment from "moment"; class ShowTickets extends Component { render() { const filteredData = this.state.role === 0 ? this.state.data.filter( (ticket) => ticket.currentUser._id === this.state.userId ) : this.state.data; return (
{this.state.role === 1 ? (

ADMIN PAGE
TICKETS

Ticket ID Ticket Desc. Current User Created By Assigned To Image Status Change Status Add Message Created TimeStamp Updated TimeStamp Closing TimeStamp {filteredData.length > 0 && filteredData.map((row, index) => ( #{index + 1} {row.name} {row.currentUser.userName} {row.createdBy.userName} {row.assignToUsers.map((user, index) => (
  • {user.userName}
))} {this.statusName(row.status)} Change Status this.changeStatus(row._id, 0)} > Opening this.changeStatus(row._id, 1)} > Waiting this.changeStatus(row._id, 2)} > Closed this.handleShow(row._id)} > {moment(row.createdTimeStamp).fromNow()} {moment(row.updatedTimeStamp).fromNow()} {moment(row.closingTimeStamp).fromNow()} ))}
) : (

USER PAGE
TICKETS

Ticket ID Ticket Desc. Image Status Change Status Add Message Created TimeStamp Updated TimeStamp Closing TimeStamp {filteredData.length > 0 && filteredData.map((row, index) => ( {index + 1} {row.name} {this.statusName(row.status)} Change Status this.changeStatus(row._id, 0)} > Opening this.changeStatus(row._id, 1)} > Waiting this.changeStatus(row._id, 2)} > Closed this.handleShow(row._id)} > {moment(row.createdTimeStamp).fromNow()} {moment(row.updatedTimeStamp).fromNow()} {moment(row.closingTimeStamp).fromNow()} ))}
)} Messages
{this.state.data .filter((ticket) => ticket._id === this.state.id)[0] ?.messages.map((message, index) => (
{message.text} {moment(message.date).fromNow()}
))}
); } } export default ShowTickets;
